channel.title: Jailbreak General
channel.description: Discussion about Jailbreak news, events and off-topic stuff.

item.title: UT3 Jailbreak Map Database

item.content:encoded:
Download the latest version of UT3 Jailbreak here!
UT3 Jailbreak - Beta 2

Here's a list of the released custom maps for UT3 Jailbreak. Maps from the main mod instalation are not included:

JB-433 by BloodyBoy (Remake) - Also found in...

UT3 Jailbreak Map Database

item.title: Jailbreak 2004c bot issue
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lightning_Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Lightning_Hunter
item.content:encoded:
I found out about Jailbreak 2004c today, so I updated my old version of JB. I was observing the bots in JB-Coralation (my all-time favorite JB map), and immediately noticed that none of the bots in vehicles were firing at enemy vehicles! Is this due to some setting with the new version, or a bug? I tried using 2004b to make sure this was an issue with 2004c, and indeed it was. The bots in vehicles were attacking each other just fine in the old version.

JB-Coralation:...

Jailbreak 2004c bot issue

Jailbreak 2004 Map Database

item.title: Updating the JB website
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded:
Hi all!

So there's a new UT game!

Should we think about updating / expanding / changing the website in any way?

I'm going to be on paternity leave pretty soon (depending on when it arrives! any day now!) and I might have a bit of time in between not sleeping very much to do a bit of tinkering...

Some ideas I've had:

  • allow mappers to create their own pages on the site for their maps, with screenshots + FTP download links
  • allow management of JB releases via the...

Updating the JB website

item.title: UT4 Jailbreak - gotta start somewhere
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
About half of Epic's UT4 team has already asked for Jailbreak already, but we are still either trying to get into the new engine or even busy with finishing UT3 Jailbreak.

But still we would like to have some additional input on that topic, as the team has gotten quite small over the last few years. In other words: It'S brainstorming time!

I'll get the most obvious stuff out of the way:
  • Jailbreak should be played on maps with team bases.
  • Each team defends one or more...

UT4 Jailbreak - gotta start somewhere

item.title: Is online Jailbreak dead?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hans Oberlander)
item.dc:creator: Hans Oberlander
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure about UT2k4, but it appears that JB III and UT3JB have no servers up. This makes me really sad because there should at least be some JB III servers running. It was the best iteration of Jailbreak, in my opinion.

Does anyone know of any Jailbreak servers that are currently on-line?

item.title: God mode is fun!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DannyMeister)
item.dc:creator: DannyMeister
item.content:encoded: Set up kismet to spawn a new mining robot every few seconds, and this is what you get. You've got to turn on god mode to have the opportunity to enjoy the beautiful sight.

item.title: Delete the illiterates' threads?
item.author: invalid@example.com (DannyMeister)
item.dc:creator: DannyMeister
item.content:encoded: Fortunately we aren't as swamped as we used to be with posts about iProducts. However, their lingering presence just annoys me, and potentially draws in the wrong kind of crowd from search engines. Thoughts on just deleting them? We've enjoyed ourselves a bit at the posters' expense, but no real classics emerged that I feel need to be saved.

item.title: Jailbreak IRC channel
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded: The Jailbreak team has its own IRC channel on enterthegame.com. Drop by and say hi on #utjb.

item.title: New UT
item.author: invalid@example.com (curlyj)
item.dc:creator: curlyj
item.content:encoded:
Is the idea of a new version of UT exciting any of the JB team / players?
UT + JB = fun times

item.title: Jailbreak 2004c (Service Pack 3) is finally available
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
Told you so. We finally managed to dig up the Jailbreak 2004c update from under a huge pile of dust and made it available for download. That was about time, as a few maps already depended on this update and as a result never were released to the public...

Jailbreak 2004c (Service Pack 3) is finally available

item.title: UTzone.de JailBreak Rock!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
This may be on quite short notice, but tonight starting at 20:00 CET (19:00 UTC, 1pm EST) UTzone.de is hosting a Jailbreak evening on their Jailbreak 2004 server. So patch up to Jailbreak 2004c if you haven't done that already, make sure you have our map packs installed and join...

UTzone.de JailBreak Rock!

item.title: A bit quiet in here
item.author: invalid@example.com (RevBillyG)
item.dc:creator: RevBillyG
item.content:encoded:
So, since not much seems to be happening lately, what have you been up to?

For myself, I've finally got a job after a year of unemployment.
I'm working in a call centre now. Terrible pay, but good people and it's better than nothing

Also, I've joined the team that are remaking the classic Descent game in UDK. I'm primarily a modeller (making wall panels at the moment.) The quality of work there is terribly high so it's really making me push myself to make something descent....

A bit quiet in here

item.title: The rational reason why there are escape routes in some maps jails
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheIronKnuckle)
item.dc:creator: TheIronKnuckle
item.content:encoded:
The maps with escape routes must be set in Germany!

http://www.omg-facts.com/Fun+Facts/Breaking-Out-Of-Prison-Is-Not-Illegal-In/55575

item.title: New personal website
item.author: invalid@example.com (RevBillyG)
item.dc:creator: RevBillyG
item.content:encoded:
So, after several years I decided to update my site.
I didn't realise I made so many maps....and there's some I never put in too

www.revbillyg.com

item.title: U4E Jailbreak
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheIronKnuckle)
item.dc:creator: TheIronKnuckle
item.content:encoded: Hey there, I was just mucking around the internets and stumbled across U4E for the 50000th time. I've always been hesitant to install it because it's too thematically crazy for me, far too much going on. But today I discovered that it comes with a version of Jailbreak. Do you guys know anything about it? Anyone here give it a spin back in the day? Are there some classic JB maps I haven't played that were designed for U4E?

item.title: [News] UT3 JB beta 2 is released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DannyMeister)
item.dc:creator: DannyMeister
item.content:encoded:
Hot on the heels of the news that beta 1 received a Make Something Unreal Contest prize, we have a new version for you to try out!

Download it now via BeyondUnreal Fileworks mirrors. At the current time, only the AtomicGamers and FileFront mirrors seem to be working, so try them first.

Zip install: UT3JB-Beta2.zip (328.77 MB)

UT3 version 2.1 with Titan Pack is required.

Following are the 11 maps in our...

[News] UT3 JB beta 2 is released!

item.title: [plug] Support me in a map contest :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Alhanalem)
item.dc:creator: Alhanalem
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I know this isn't directly jailbreak related, but since it was working with the Jailbreak team that sparked my interest in this sort of thing, I figured I'd come to my friends here first.

After being involved with first the moderator team @ the official Dungeon Defenders forums and soon after the official beta team (All I can say on that, due to an NDA), I've taken a stab at making a map for this game which I've pumped a suprising amount of time into....

[plug] Support me in a map contest
